definition: to explore a mystery/to probe the unknown
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: Then, they will find a way to search and know that person well.
sentences.chinese: 然後，探祕將會找到能更好發掘和了解的道路。

sentences.english: Let your Spring Festival holiday to start a journey of exploration incan civilization.
sentences.chinese: 讓您的春節假期開始一次探祕印加文明之旅。

sentences.english: Jewel Quest Solitaire and Super Mahjong explore two games collection.
sentences.chinese: 寶石探祕紙牌與超級麻將探索兩款遊戲的合集。

sentences.english: Visitors can explore areas where the crew slept.
sentences.chinese: 遊客還可以探祕船員們睡覺的地方。
